speaker: James Miles
title: Coding in Interviews
description: Have you ever had to write code in an interview? Did you @#$* your pants? Is it even a good idea to make people code in such a high pressure environment? In this session I’ll aim to address these questions and provide a basic methodology to help guarantee success in your next coding interview!\n\nI'm have a passion for computer programming and the design of software systems. I'm currently and engineering lead at VGW where I look after the Casino engineering team.
